Package geekshop.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GSOrderRepository
    Repository to store GSOrders.
    JokeRepository
    Repository to store Jokes.
    MessageRepository
    Repository to store Messages.
    PasswordRulesRepository
    Repository to store PasswordRules.
    SubCategoryRepository
    Repository to store SubCategorys.
    SuperCategoryRepository
    Repository to store SuperCategorys.
    UserRepository
    Repository to store Users.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GSInventoryItem
    An extension of InventoryItem extended by a minimal Quantity in stock which must not be undercut.
    GSOrder
    An extension of Order extended by order number, OrderType and, if this order is a reclaim, the initial order this order is referring to.
    GSOrderLine
    An extension of OrderLine extended by OrderType.
    GSProduct
    An extension of Product extended by a unique product number, the SubCategory the product is related to and a flag marking whether this product is in range.
    GSProductOrder
    A helper class for view to encapsulate a GSOrderLine related to a specific Product as well as the date sold and the seller.
    GSProductOrders
    A helper class for view to encapsulate all GSOrderLines related to a specific Product as well as the total price and total quantity.
    Joke
    Class representing a joke displayed after user login.
    Message
    Class representing a message to the owner displayed on /messages.
    PasswordAttributes
    Represents the attributes of an password to easily determine whether this password matches the password rules.
    PasswordRules
    This class encapsulates the rules with which User's Passwords are validated.
    ReclaimTupel
    Tupel that assists to bring GSProduct and OrderLine in one Model.
    SubCategory
    Class representing a SubCategory which contains Products.
    SuperCategory
    Class representing a SuperCategory which contains SubCategorys.
    User
    This class represents the shop's Users (shop owner and his employees).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Gender
    Enumeration representing the User's gender.
    MaritalStatus
    Enumeration representing the User's marital status.
    MessageKind
    Enumeration for the kind of Message.
    OrderType
    Enumeration for the type of an GSOrder.
    PaymentType
    Enumeration representing the payment Method of GSOrder.
